a.title: Go to Ridgefield Park School District

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.h2: Welcome to Ridgefield Park School District

div.p:
Our mission is to offer students educational opportunities that will foster lifelong
learning and enable them to function politically, economically, and socially in a
democratic society. Students will be assisted in becoming self-respecting individuals
who reach their greatest potential. They will learn to act fairly in relationships with
others, solve problems using effective methods, and think critically and independently.
Constant improvement of the educational program will focus on all students
achieving the New Jersey Student Learning Standards at their respective grade
levels. By providing essential resources and working with home and community, we
will help students acquire the skills and knowledge they need to enter the work
force or pursue higher education, and to become responsible global citizens.
Link to our Strategic Planning Goals

img.alt: School Lunch - Clipart Of Lunch, HD Png Download - 1002x1165 ...

blockquote.style: text-align: center; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin: 0px 0px 0px 40px; border: none; padding: 0px;

strong.span:
IMPORTANT Free & Reduced Lunch Announcements
The Free & Reduced meal service will be closed next Friday, April 10, 2020. Meals for both Thursday and Friday next week will, therefore, be distributed next Thursday, April 9, 2020.

blockquote.style: text-align: center; margin: 0px 0px 0px 40px; border: none; padding: 0px;

li.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); margin-left: 15px; text-align: left;
li.span: The district has made the decision to continue the daily distribution of Free & Reduced Lunches through the upcoming spring break, (Monday, April 6th through Monday, April 13, 2020). Grab & Go meals are distributed to eligible families, Monday through Friday between the hours of 11:00 am and 1:00 pm, in the rear of the Jr./Sr. High School.

li.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); margin-left: 15px; text-align: left;
li.span: Families must have an approved Free/Reduced Lunch Application on file with the district to be eligible for this meal service.

li.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin-left: 15px; text-align: left;

span.span: Due to the ongoing Corona Virus pandemic, the district is re-opening the application process. Families are urged to utilize our new online application process.
Please proceed to Genesis' Parent Portal to access the online Lunch Application.

aper application will still be accepted. Please visit the following link which contains information on how families can apply or reapply for Free & Reduced Lunch benefits. Link to instructions and forms
